I've been enjoying creating my comics and presenting them to publishers, but school is taking up a lot of my time.

content.text: Hey, what are some of your hobbies?
I'm a translator, and I have a lot of hobbies. I love to cook, and I also collect souvenirs from my travels.
That's really cool, I love to travel too! What's your favorite place you've been to?
I'd have to say my favorite place is Japan. The culture is so different, and the food is amazing!
I've never been to Japan, but it's definitely on my list! I'm really excited to see how Game of Thrones ends too, I've been watching it since the beginning.
Me too! I'm not sure how it's going to end, but I'm sure it's going to be epic.
I'm also a big fan of comic books. I've been working on creating my own comic, but school has been taking up a lot of my time.
That's really cool! I would love to see it when you're finished.
Thanks, I'll be sure to let you know.
I'm also a soccer mom. I have two kids, and I love taking them to their games.
That's great! I bet it's a lot of fun.
It is, but it can also be a lot of work.
I can imagine. Well, it was nice meeting you!
